I struggled with binge eating for a time, probably for a little under a year, and it was the most terrifying thing I ever went through. I felt so out control and scared and ashamed. I would count the days I would go without binging and rarely made it to week. It felt like everyone I confided in would just shrug it off or underplay it and I wanted to cry and list the foods I would eat in one sitting but I was just too embarrassed.
I dont know exactly what stopped it. I cut down on drinking a lot and went back to gym and that helped. I still struggle with it time to time. I'm sorry you're struggling with it, it really is an emotionally debilitating thing and not a joke. :(
kind of feels like you're the one obsessed with his foreskin

I follow the esports community and if you're a girl in the scene you're pretty much gonna shit on no matter what, especially in twitch chat. Well there's a female shoutcaster that pretty recently started casting in the world championships of a certain game, and she's pretty much the only female caster right now. She's definitely in the overweight category, and she predictably gets a lot hate for it in twitch chat.
I've always liked her, I think she's pretty damn good at her job, definitely better than some of the more popular male casters, and it was cool to finally see a woman in the scene.
A few days ago she posted a tweet regarding something said in twitch chat that basically said, "finally, someone knows the difference between fat and curvy!"
Lost some respect for her. :( Like I dont really care that you're kind of fat but dont deny it ugh.
